headline: Genmab (CPSE:GMAB) Valuation Check After Epcoritamab Trial Update And DARZALEX Royalty Momentum
summary: What Genmab’s latest trial data and royalty update mean for shareholders Genmab (CPSE:GMAB) has drawn fresh attention after releasing Phase 3 EPCORE DLBCL-1 topline data for epcoritamab and reporting 2025 worldwide DARZALEX net trade sales of US$14.35b under its Johnson & Johnson license. The twin updates matter because they touch both sides of the Genmab story: current royalty cash flows from partnered drugs, and the longer term value investors may see in its late stage oncology...
